property.name: numberOfMembers
property.label: Number of Members to Display
property.description: Number of members records to display on the page (looks best in 3's).

property.name: variant
property.label: Display Options
property.description: Select the layout display option.

property.name: layout
property.label: List tile layout
property.description: Member tile initial layout - vertical or horizontal.

property.name: displayTitle
property.label: Display Member Title
property.description: Check box for enable and disable display of user title

property.name: displayPhone
property.label: Display Member Phone Number
property.description: Check box for enable and disable display of user Phone Number

property.name: clickToCall
property.label: Enable click-to-call
property.description: If enabled, the user can click on the phone number to launch the Phone app on the device

property.name: displayEmail
property.label: Display Member Email Address
property.description: Check box for enable and disable display of user Email Address

property.name: displayKnowledge
property.label: Display Member Knowledge
property.description: Check box for enable and disable display of Member Knowledge

property.name: displayFollowButton
property.label: Display follow button
property.description: Enable the follow/un-follow button on the user tile

property.name: displayChatterStats
property.label: Display Member chatter stats
property.description: Display chatter statistics for the user

property.name: initialLoad
property.label: Load member list on startup
property.description: Load members on page load

property.name: hideInternal
property.label: Hide internal users
property.description: Hide internal members (standard SF license) from the community

property.name: featureOption
property.label: Featured Members Options
property.datasource: None,User ID List,User Nickname List,Custom Metadata,User Record Featured Checkbox
property.description: select feature option for showing feature members

property.name: featureMemberList
property.label: Featured Members Values
property.description: Enter CSV or Meta record name for members

property.name: excludedMembers
property.label: Excluded Member IDs
property.description: Comma delimited list of member ids to exclude from the list

property.name: titleSearchValue
property.label: Filter by Title
property.description: Specify the title value to filter

property.name: countryFilter
property.label: Filter by Country
property.description: Specify the country value to filter

property.name: stateFilter
property.label: Filter by State
property.description: Specify the state value to filter

property.name: cityFilter
property.label: Filter by City
property.description: Specify the city value to filter

property.name: accountFilter
property.label: Filter by Account
property.description: Specify the account value to filter

property.name: topicFilter
property.label: Filter by Topic ID
property.description: Specify the topic ID to filter on

property.name: customLabel1
property.label: Field 1: Label
property.description: Define a label for custom field 1

property.name: customField1
property.label: Field 1: Field
property.description: Custom field 1 to display on the tile (ex: Contact.MyField__c)

property.name: customLabel2
property.label: Field 2: Label
property.description: Define a label for custom field 2

property.name: customField2
property.label: Field 2: Field
property.description: Custom field 2 to display on the tile

property.name: customLabel3
property.label: Field 3: Label
property.description: Define a label for custom field 3

property.name: customField3
property.label: Field 3: Field
property.description: Custom field 3 to display on the tile

property.name: customLabel4
property.label: Field 4: Label
property.description: Define a label for custom field 4

property.name: customField4
property.label: Field 4: Field
property.description: Custom field 4 to display on the tile

property.name: customLabel5
property.label: Field 5: Label
property.description: Define a label for custom field 5

property.name: customField5
property.label: Field 5: Field
property.description: Custom field 5 to display on the tile

property.name: customLabel6
property.label: Field 6: Label
property.description: Define a label for custom field 6

property.name: customField6
property.label: Field 6: Field
property.description: Custom field 6 to display on the tile

property.name: customFilter1
property.label: Filter 1: Field
property.description: Define custom filter 1 field name

property.name: customValue1
property.label: Filter 1: Value
property.description: Specify the value for custom filter 1 to filter

property.name: customFilter2
property.label: Filter 2: Field
property.description: Define custom filter 2 field name

property.name: customValue2
property.label: Filter 2: Value
property.description: Specify the value for custom filter 2 to filter

property.name: customFilter3
property.label: Filter 3: Field
property.description: Define custom filter 3 field name

property.name: customValue3
property.label: Filter 3: Value
property.description: Specify the value for custom filter 3 to filter

property.name: customFilter4
property.label: Filter 4: Field
property.description: Define custom filter 4 field name

property.name: customValue4
property.label: Filter 4: Value
property.description: Specify the value for custom filter 4 to filter

property.name: customFilter5
property.label: Filter 5: Field
property.description: Define custom filter 5 field name

property.name: customValue5
property.label: Filter 5: Value
property.description: Specify the value for custom filter 5 to filter

property.name: customFilter6
property.label: Filter 6: Field
property.description: Define custom filter 6 field name

property.name: customValue6
property.label: Filter 6: Value
property.description: Specify the value for custom filter 6 to filter

property.name: customClass
property.label: Custom Class
property.description: Used for custom styling.

property.name: listId
property.label: List Id
property.description: Id of specific List
